RAILWAY PORTER.Definition: a person who carried luggage at a train station

LABOUR CAMP.Definition: a place where prisoners were forced to do hard work

MAKE ENDS MEET.Definition: earn enough money to cover basic expenses

COINS.Definition: small round pieces of metal used as money

SARDINES.Definition: small fish often packed tightly together (used here to mean very crowded)

SWAYING.Definition: moving slowly from side to side

COLLECTIVISATION.Definition: system where land and resources were owned by the community or state

FORESIGHT.Definition: ability to see or plan for the future

WORKED HIS WAY UP.Definition: gradually moved to a higher position through hard work

BRANCHED OUT.Definition: started to do something new or different

NAPKIN.Definition: a piece of cloth or paper used to wipe the mouth while eating

CRACKDOWN.Definition: severe effort to stop or control them

LEASE.Definition: a legal agreement to rent it

ABSORBED.Definition: taken in and made part of

SUPPRESSION.Definition: the act of stopping or limiting forcefully

GOSSIP.Definition: information about other people's private lives

BOYCOTT.Definition: refuse to buy or use its products as a protest

TENABLE.Definition: possible to be defended or held

HANDOVER.Definition: the act of giving control or responsibility

BEACON.Definition: a symbol of hope or inspiration

MEGAPHONE.Definition: a device that makes voices louder

TEAR GAS.Definition: gas that causes tears and pain, used to control crowds

WATER CANNONS.Definition: devices that shoot water at high pressure, used to control crowds

INTERPRET.Definition: explain the meaning of it, understand or regard

FROGMARCHED.Definition: forced to walk by holding and pushing the arms firmly

FLANKED.Definition: held or accompanied on each side

STERN-LOOKING.Definition: having a serious and strict appearance

SEIZED.Definition: taken control of suddenly and by force

UNLAWFUL ASSEMBLY.Definition: a group of people gathered illegally

COLLUDING.Definition: secretly working together to do something illegal

FOREGONE CONCLUSION.Definition: a result that is certain to happen

SHOW TRIAL.Definition: an unfair trial intended to make an example of him
